articles.title: Kangaroo courts by media, agenda-driven debates weakening democracy, says CJI
articles.description: CJI Ramana also pointed out that there has been an increase in the number of physical attacks on judges and asserted that non-filling up of judicial vacancies and not improving the infrastructure were the main reasons for pendency of cases in the country.

articles.title: In big relief for UP consumers, ₹7 power tariff slab gone. Check new rates
articles.description: The UP Electricity Regulatory Commission (UPERC) announced that domestic BPL consumers in urban regions of the state will now pay ₹3 per unit spending up to 100 units of electricity.
